message.raw:
Tested and tweaked pch configuration

currently using cmake macro
this doesn't extend well like Qt which need lots of extra flags

Some timing information, but it seems like 50% overall is a reasonable goal for this endeavor

gazebo_common: 3m 32s -> 1m 20s
gazebo_transport: 1m 10s -> 45s
gazebo_math: 25s -> 12s
